response.original_title: Slow Cycling: Riding The Lost Lanes Of Britain - London To Canterbury
response.overview: Crit racer and cycling speed freak Alec Briggs joins Jack Thurston, as they leave the noise of London behind and follow an ancient pilgrim’s trail to the stunning cathedral city of Canterbury. Starting at Westminster Bridge, they’re on a meandering mission to discover if lost lanes really can be found anywhere. As the capital gives way to lush, English countryside that’s steeped in history, Jack invites Alex to slow down, and enjoy the spiritual ride.
response.title: Slow Cycling: Riding The Lost Lanes Of Britain - London To Canterbury

results.name: Slow Cycling: Riding the lost lanes of Britain | EP.5: London to Canterbury
